abstract: With Europe teetering, joblessness rising and rumors of hedge fund implosions running rampant, the economic horrors of 2008 may again be upon us. "The veil between recovery and recession has never been thinner," Joshua Brown writes on his Reformed Broker blog.
snippet: With Europe teetering, joblessness rising and rumors of hedge fund implosions running rampant, the economic horrors of 2008 may again be upon us. "The veil between recovery and recession has never been thinner," Joshua Brown writes on his Reformed...
lead_paragraph: With Europe teetering, joblessness rising and rumors of hedge fund implosions running rampant, the economic horrors of 2008 may again be upon us. "The veil between recovery and recession has never been thinner and all the old ghosts of the past have returned to haunt us once again," Joshua Brown writes on his Reformed Broker blog. Read more »

headline.main: Global Markets Enter the Witching Hour
